trans-unit.note: Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Create a Free Account"; ObjectID = "13";

trans-unit.source: Please choose a password you'd like to use with TunnelBear
trans-unit.target: Lütfen TunnelBear için bir şifre seç
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITextField"; accessibilityHint = "Please choose a password you'd like to use with TunnelBear"; ObjectID = "64";
Class = "UITextField"; accessibilityHint = "Please enter your TunnelBear password"; ObjectID = "47";

trans-unit.source: Opens password reset form in Safari
trans-unit.note: Class = "UIButton"; accessibilityHint = "Opens password reset form in Safari"; ObjectID = "77";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Turn TunnelBear ON here."; ObjectID = "WN0-Nv-lk5";

trans-unit.source: Rawrr! Problems with your TunnelBear? Please contact support for a response within 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: Roorrr! TunnelBear sorun mu çıkarıyor? Lütfen 24 saat içinde cevap almak için destek ekibine ulaş.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITextView"; text = "Rawrr! Problems with your TunnelBear? Please contact support for a response within 24 hours."; ObjectID = "d5Q-6h-6Nb";

trans-unit.source: Go to “Settings” to choose your country and turn VPN on and off.
trans-unit.target: Ülkeni seçmek ve VPN'i açmak veya kapatmak için “Ayarlar” menüsüne git.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Go to “Settings” to choose your country and turn VPN on and off."; ObjectID = "0Gj-sl-JBI";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "You're currently using manual controls."; ObjectID = "JU5-Dk-53I";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Switch to In-App Controls?"; ObjectID = "Scc-ra-AR5";
Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "We don't collect your data!"; ObjectID = "jlR-rX-XRe";

trans-unit.source: TunnelBear needs to install “VPN” settings on your iPhone. Tap Install when you're prompted.
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear'in iPhone'una “VPN” ayarları yüklemesi gerekiyor. Sorulduğunda “yükle”ye bas.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "TunnelBear needs to install “VPN” settings on your iPhone. Tap Install when you're prompted."; ObjectID = "VB8-wO-0Di";
Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "Choose a way to tunnel"; ObjectID = "3GF-DA-YqY";

trans-unit.source: I want to control TunnelBear from within the app (recommended)
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear'i uygulama içinden yönetmek istiyorum (tavsiye edilen)
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "I want to control TunnelBear from within the app (recommended)"; ObjectID = "ZdH-hT-C3L";

trans-unit.source: For up to 5 computers, phones or tablets
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "For up to 5 computers, phones or tablets"; ObjectID = "Kkn-rl-mak";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "500 MB Data remaining"; ObjectID = "fRo-l6-Vzu";
Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "Please enter your Twitter ID"; ObjectID = "3YB-rY-Wxe";

trans-unit.source: We want to make sure we send the free GB to the right person.
trans-unit.target: Ücretsiz 1 GB'ı doğru kişiye yollamak istiyoruz da.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "We want to make sure we send the free GB to the right person."; ObjectID = "32A-vc-cSB";

trans-unit.source: The always vigilant TunnelBear team will see you've tweeted.
trans-unit.target: Her zaman tetikte olan TunnelBear ekibi tweet attığını görecek.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "The always vigilant TunnelBear team will see you've tweeted."; ObjectID = "LQF-yZ-SMv";

trans-unit.source: Within the hour, your TunnelBear account will have a bonus GB of free data for the month.
trans-unit.target: Bir saat içinde TunnelBear hesabına bu aylık ekstra 1 GB ücretsiz veri aktarılacak.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Within the hour, your TunnelBear account will have a bonus GB of free data for the month."; ObjectID = "j0W-si-tZI";

trans-unit.source: Tweet @theTunnelBear asking for 1 free GB of data.
trans-unit.target: @theTunnelBear'e tweet atıp ücretsiz 1 GB verini iste.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Tweet @theTunnelBear asking for 1 free GB of data."; ObjectID = "mxl-i6-1Fu";
Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "Tweet for a FREE GB!"; ObjectID = "nmI-Ks-9gO";

trans-unit.source: Your 1GB of free data should appear within the hour.
trans-unit.target: 1 GB ücretsiz verin bir saat içinde gelecek.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Your 1GB of free data should appear within the hour."; ObjectID = "Fd1-X4-kYs";

trans-unit.source: You can tweet again next month for another free GB!
trans-unit.target: Gelecek ay ücretsiz 1 GB kazanmak için tekrar tweet atabilirsin!
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "You can tweet again next month for another free GB!"; ObjectID = "mRJ-U1-Sc9";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "We've sent you a bear!"; ObjectID = "2JP-sf-gYi";

trans-unit.source: Please check your email to confirm we’ve sent your bear to the right address:
trans-unit.target: Ayını doğru adrese gönderip göndermediğimizi kontrol etmek için lütfen e-postana bak:
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Please check your email to confirm we’ve sent your bear to the right address:"; ObjectID = "PXg-NA-y5J";

trans-unit.id: By confirming you will send TunnelBear a report that might help us further diagnose your bear.
trans-unit.source: By confirming you will send TunnelBear a report that might help us further diagnose your bear.
trans-unit.target: Bunu onaylayarak ayına daha iyi teşhis koyabilmemiz için TunnelBear'e rapor göndermeyi kabul ediyorsun.

trans-unit.id: Connection Secure!\n While connected, you can use other apps as if you're in %@!
trans-unit.source: Connection Secure! While connected, you can use other apps as if you're in %@!
trans-unit.target: Bağlantı Güvenli! Bağlantı varken diğer uygulamaları şu ülkedeymiş gibi kullanabilirsin: %@.

trans-unit.id: Couldn't connect, please try again later
trans-unit.source: Couldn't connect, please try again later
trans-unit.target: Bağlanılamadı, lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene

trans-unit.id: For up to 5 computers, phones or tablets
trans-unit.source: For up to 5 computers, phones or tablets

trans-unit.id: Grr! TunnelBear couldn't reach the internet! Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Grr! TunnelBear couldn't reach the internet! Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Gırr! TunnelBear internete erişemedi! Lütfen tekrar dene.

trans-unit.id: Grr! TunnelBear device settings not installed. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Grr! TunnelBear device settings not installed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Gırr! TunnelBear cihaz ayarları yüklenmedi. Lütfen tekrar dene.

trans-unit.id: Grr! TunnelBear device settings not installed. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Grr! TunnelBear device settings not installed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Gırr! TunnelBear cihaz ayarları yüklenmedi. Lütfen tekrar dene.

trans-unit.id: Grr! TunnelBear needs to install additional device settings. Tap “install” when you are prompted.
trans-unit.source: Grr! TunnelBear needs to install additional device settings. Tap “install” when you are prompted.
trans-unit.target: Gırr! TunnelBear'in ek cihaz ayarları yüklemesi gerek. Sorulduğunda “yükle”ye bas.

trans-unit.id: Grrr… Out of data for the month. Upgrade your Bear for unlimited data!
trans-unit.source: Grrr… Out of data for the month. Upgrade your Bear for unlimited data!
trans-unit.target: Gırrr… Bu aylık veri bitti. Sınırsız veri için ayını üst sürüme geçir!

trans-unit.id: How about a quick rating on the App Store, then?
trans-unit.source: How about a quick rating on the App Store, then?
trans-unit.target: App Store'da çabucak puan vermeye ne dersin?

trans-unit.id: I really like doing things the hard way. I want to tunnel with manual settings.
trans-unit.source: I really like doing things the hard way. I want to tunnel with manual settings.
trans-unit.target: İşleri zor yoldan yapmayı çok seviyorum. Manuel ayarlarla tünel açmak istiyorum.
Bir satın alım daha yapılsın mı?

trans-unit.id: Must be logged in to process purchase.
trans-unit.source: Must be logged in to process purchase.
trans-unit.target: Satın alım için giriş yapılması gerekir.

trans-unit.id: Oi mate! %@ is only available for upgraded bears.
trans-unit.source: Oi mate! %@ is only available for upgraded bears.
trans-unit.target: Selam dostum! %@ sadece üst sürümdeki ayılara açıktır.

trans-unit.id: Out of Data for the month
trans-unit.source: Out of Data for the month

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid Twitter ID.
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid Twitter ID.
trans-unit.target: Lütfen geçerli bir Twitter kullanıcı adı gir.

trans-unit.id: Rawr! It seems that your %@ is not connected to the Internet.
trans-unit.source: Rawr! It seems that your %@ is not connected to the Internet.
trans-unit.target: Rorr! Görünüşe göre %@ cihazın internete bağlı değil.

trans-unit.id: Rawr! Looks like Twitter is either having issues or is blocked by your service provider.
trans-unit.source: Rawr! Looks like Twitter is either having issues or is blocked by your service provider.
trans-unit.target: Rorr! Görünüşe göre Twitter sorun yaşıyor ya da servis sağlayıcın tarafından engellenmiş.

trans-unit.id: Rawr! TunnelBear is having trouble fetching product information. Try again later?
trans-unit.source: Rawr! TunnelBear is having trouble fetching product information. Try again later?
trans-unit.target: Rorr! TunnelBear ürün bilgisini alamıyor. Daha sonra tekrar dener misin?

trans-unit.id: Rawr! Your TunnelBear is having trouble fetching products from the App Store. Try again later?
trans-unit.source: Rawr! Your TunnelBear is having trouble fetching products from the App Store. Try again later?
trans-unit.target: Rorr! TunnelBear, App Store'dan ürün alamıyor. Daha sonra tekrar dener misin?

trans-unit.id: Rawr! Your TunnelBear is having trouble reaching the App Store. Try again later?
trans-unit.source: Rawr! Your TunnelBear is having trouble reaching the App Store. Try again later?
trans-unit.target: Rorr! TunnelBear, App Store'a ulaşamıyor. Daha sonra tekrar dener misin?

trans-unit.id: Rawrr! Problems with your TunnelBear? Please contact support for a response within 24 hours.
trans-unit.source: Rawrr! Problems with your TunnelBear? Please contact support for a response within 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: Roorrr! TunnelBear sorun mu çıkarıyor? Lütfen 24 saat içinde cevap almak için destek ekibine ulaş.

trans-unit.id: Rawrrr! Your bear has been upgraded.
trans-unit.source: Rawrrr! Your bear has been upgraded.

trans-unit.id: To use a TunnelBear, you'll need to accept the TunnelBear Terms of Service.
trans-unit.source: To use a TunnelBear, you'll need to accept the TunnelBear Terms of Service.
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear'i kullanabilmek için TunnelBear Hizmet Şartları'nı kabul etmen gerek.

trans-unit.id: TunnelBear can send you notifications when you are low on data. Tap “OK” when prompted to receive them.
trans-unit.source: TunnelBear can send you notifications when you are low on data. Tap “OK” when prompted to receive them.
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear verin azaldığında bildirim gönderebilir. Bildirimleri almak için sorulduğunda “Tamam”a bas.
trans-unit.note: Notifying users why we use notifications.

trans-unit.id: TunnelBear needs to install “VPN” settings on your %@. Tap Install when you’re prompted.
trans-unit.source: TunnelBear needs to install “VPN” settings on your %@. Tap Install when you’re prompted.
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear'in %@ cihazına “VPN” ayarları yüklemesi gerekiyor. Sorulduğunda “yükle”ye bas.

trans-unit.id: Turn TunnelBear ON to make your location and data private!\n\n
trans-unit.source: Turn TunnelBear ON to make your location and data private!
trans-unit.target: Konumunu ve verini gizlemek için TunnelBear'i aç!
ÜCRETSİZ 1 GB için tweet atar mısın?

trans-unit.id: Yikes! Well would you mind telling us what you don’t like about your Bear?
trans-unit.source: Yikes! Well would you mind telling us what you don’t like about your Bear?
trans-unit.target: Amanın!Ayından neden memnun olmadığını söyler misin peki?

trans-unit.id: You already have a pending purchase that TunnelBear hasn't processed yet. Make another purchase anyway?
trans-unit.source: You already have a pending purchase that TunnelBear hasn't processed yet. Make another purchase anyway?
trans-unit.target: TunnelBear'in henüz tamamlamadığı bir satın alım işlemin var. Bir satın alım daha yapacak mısın?

trans-unit.id: You'll see a message when you upgrade. This is the default message shown for all app store subscriptions. Even if you tap “Allow” we don’t actually collect or store this information. You can see our privacy policy here.
trans-unit.source: You'll see a message when you upgrade. This is the default message shown for all app store subscriptions. Even if you tap “Allow” we don’t actually collect or store this information. You can see our privacy policy here.
trans-unit.target: Üst sürüme geçtiğinde mesaj gelecek. Bu varsayılan mesaj bütün App Store aboneliklerinde gösterilir. “İzin ver”e bassan da aslında bu bilgiyi toplamayız, depolamayız. Gizlilik politikamızı buradan okuyabilirsin.

trans-unit.id: You're already connected to this tunnel.
trans-unit.source: You're already connected to this tunnel.

trans-unit.id: Your TunnelBear is out of food (data)!
trans-unit.source: Your TunnelBear is out of food (data)!

trans-unit.id: The password must be at least %lu characters long.
trans-unit.source: The password must be at least %lu characters long.

trans-unit.id: This doesn't look like a valid email.
trans-unit.source: This doesn't look like a valid email.
